Taskinator App

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS

Taskinator is a task-tracker app. Taskinator will allow you to organize your personal to-do list items by using a dropdown menu to change the task status and move the task into To Do, In Progress, & Completed lists.

View Project on GitHub

Taskmaster Pro App

Built With: JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap

A more advanced version of the original Taskinator. You can add & delete tasks with a description and date. As well as having categoires for your tasks.

View Project on GitHub
